title: Episode 157: Hannah Cranna, the Wicked Witch of Monroe County
description:
High upon a hill lived an older woman whose power and influence terrified those around her. Anyone who dared cross her would find themselves burdened with bad fortune. Was she truly an all-powerful witch, or were the townspeople merely reaping what they sowed?
